thought.text: Now let me test the fix:

action.command:
cd /tmp/tmpyjyraizy/sympy && python -c "
from sympy import MatrixSymbol

A = MatrixSymbol('A', 2, 2)
B = MatrixSymbol('B', 2, 2)
expr = A - B

print('Testing _mat_coeff_isneg function:')
for i, arg in enumerate(expr.args):
    print(f'  arg[{i}]: {arg}')
    if hasattr(arg, 'args') and len(arg.args) > 0:
        first_arg = arg.args[0]
        print(f'    first_arg: {first_arg}, type: {type(first_arg)}')
        print(f'    is_Number: {hasattr(first_arg, \"is_Number\") and first_arg.is_Number}')
        if hasattr(first_arg, 'is_Number') and first_arg.is_Number:
            print(f'    is_negative: {hasattr(first_arg, \"is_negative\") and first_arg.is_negative}')
"
